description:
NGC 1316 - Fornax A 
An image of Fornax A that lies in the galaxy rich region of Fornax. The image is orientated South-North with the top being South.

This is a cropped version that covers 32.92' x, 26.25'

Front and centre is the super bright Fornax A galaxy, an elliptical galaxy that has extended lobes extending NE-SW. 
The galaxy didn't exhibit much colour in my image but the reddish dust lane is discernible if you zoom in. 

Location: Central Victorian Highlands, Victoria, Australia
Dates: 7 Oct - 10 Oct 2018
Optics: AG Optical Systems 12.5" iDK,
Focal length 2121 mm
Camera: mono FLI ML16200 with a Loadstar X2 on an Astrodon MOAG off-axis guider.
Acquisition: Software: Sequence Generator Pro
Lum : 75 x  5min luminance
18 x 3min red binned 2x2
18 x 3min green binned 2x2
18 x 3min blue binned 2x2

Total integration 8 hours 57 minutes
title: Fornax A - NGC 1316
